articles.description: All the latest Champions League reaction as Paris St-Germain beat Aston Villa on aggregate to reach the semi-finals.
articles.title: Champions League LIVE reaction: PSG reach semi-finals despite heroic Villa comeback

articles.description: Real Madrid players say they are convinced they can overturn a 3-0 first-leg deficit against Arsenal, but is this a comeback too far for the European champions?
articles.title: Real Madrid v Arsenal (agg 0-3): Can Champions League comeback kings Real Madrid overturn first-leg deficit?

articles.description: A political leaders' debate in Canada is moved to avoid a clash with the Montreal Canadiens' fixture against the Carolina Hurricanes.
articles.title: Canada election debate moved to avoid clash with NHL game

articles.description: Barcelona defender Mapi Leon is banned for two Liga F matches after allegedly touching an opponent's groin.
articles.title: Barcelona defender Mapi Leon given two-match ban for allegedly touching Daniela Caracas' groin

articles.description: A system malfunction led to the wrong anthem being played before Aston Villa's Champions League quarter-final second leg against Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Aston Villa Champions League anthem: System malfunction behind error

articles.description: Following Luka Modric's investment in Swansea City, the BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team looks into why more and more footballers are snubbing management.
articles.title: Modric, Ronaldo & Beckham: Why footballers are snubbing management

articles.description: Marcus Rashford produces arguably his best display as Aston Villa come close to completing a stunning comeback against Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery praises 'fantastic' forward

articles.description: Ruben Amorim will either recall or drop goalkeeper Andre Onana for Man Utd's Europa League quarter-final second leg against Lyon - and it's a big call for several reasons.
articles.title: Andre Onana: Why Ruben Amorim's next decision on Man Utd goalkeeper issue is so big

articles.description: British number four Harriet Dart asks the umpire to tell her opponent to put on deodorant during her first-round loss at the Rouen Open.
articles.title: Harriet Dart: Briton makes deodorant comment about opponent Lois Boisson in Rouen Open defeat

articles.description: New Zealand centre Rieko Ioane will join United Rugby Championship and Champions Cup frontrunners Leinster for the 2025-26 season.
articles.title: Rieko Ioane: All Blacks centre to join Leinster on one-season deal
